title: Baby Loves Baking
description: Baby Loves Baking is a delightful picture book that introduces the baby to the wonderful world of baking. The baby observes mummy in the kitchen closely and learns the basics of baking. She learns about the different textures and tastes of the ingredients. She helps mummy bake a lovely cake for daddy and ice it too! This book is sure to make your young one clamour to enter the kitchen as soon as possible.
author: Catherine Habbie
